title: Jenna Dewan looks radiant as she disguises her baby bump under a long, stripey skirt at BuzzFeed
text:
Jenna Dewan is doing the rounds to talk up her tell-all book Gracefully You: Finding Beauty And Balance In The Everyday.

On Thursday she popped into BuzzFeed's AM To DM studio in New York City.

The Step-Up star is pregnant with her second child, but managed to conceal her baby bump with a high-waisted skirt.

Beautiful brunette: Jenna Dewan is doing the rounds to talk up her tell-all book Gracefully You: Finding Beauty And Balance In The Everyday and on Thursday she was at BuzzFeed's studio

The 38-year-old has dished about the reasons she and Channing Tatum, 39, called it quits after nine years of marriage.

In the book she writes: 'First and foremost I had to accept the realization this isn't working and had moved into hurting.'

And she added: 'I'd come to realize the dynamic I was in wasn't serving me nor was it serving my daughter.' The couple share Everly, six.

They had, in fact, decided to separate three months before their shock announcement stunned their millions of social media fans back in April 2018.

Having a chat: The 38-year-old actress and dancer dished about some of the reasons she and Channing, 39, called it quits after nine years of marriage

Talking with the man: She was interviewed by BuzzFeed's Zach Stafford

Their long statement said they had 'lovingly chosen to separate as a couple.'

But Jenna revealed in her book that she had had to hide the breakup from her World Of Dance colleagues, which was about to begin its second season.

'The public saw Channing and I in this idealized romanticized light,' she wrote of that time. 'This made things difficult for me because I like being as honest and real as I can.'

The actress and author is now expecting her first baby with her new beau, Tony Award-winning actor Steve Kazee, 43.

With her beau: Jenna stunned in a red dress as she and Tony Award-winning actor Steve Kazee, 43, were seen out and about in Manhattan on Wednesday

Bumping along nicely: She turned sideways to show off er burgeoning belly

And she looked lovely in a white, scooped neck T-shirt and a long skirt with wide pink stripes and thinner purple and fawn bumps that hid her bump.

The beautiful brunette teamed it with an ankle-length fawn trench coat.

She and Channing met on the set of Step Up in 2006 and married in Malibu on July 11 in Malibu.

He has yet to respond to her book but he, too, has moved on. Channing is presently dating British singer Jessie J, 31.
description: The pregnant dancer and actress, 38, appeared to be glowing with health as she talked up her new tell all book,Gracefully You: Finding Beauty And Balance In The Everyday on Thursday in NYC.
